title: A content object.
description: Holds common attributes of ANS Content objects.

canonical_url.description: The fully qualified URL to the story.

short_url.description: A url-shorterned version of the canonical_url.

status.description: Optional field to store story workflow related status (e.g. published/embargoed/etc)

related_content.description: A list of IDs referencing other content items this story is related to.

promo_images.description: List of promotional images to use when highlighting the story.

taxonomy.description: A collection of metadata, keywords, etc. describing this story.

publish_date.description: When the story was first published.

display_date.description: The RFC3339-formatted dated time of the most recent date the story was (re)displayed on a public site.

editor_note.description: Additional information to be displayed in/near the story html content from the editor.
